content:
{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-208-12-B
|Item_parent=Chronic respiratory failure
|Item_parent_short=Chronic respiratory failure
|Rank=B
|Title=Knowing the medico-social implications of CKD (Long Term Disability)
|Description=None
|Rubric=Prise en charge
|Contributors=
|Order=12}}
Severe CKD (Pa02<60mmHg) entitles the patient to exemption from co-payment under ALD 14.

question.question: What is the medical condition that entitles a patient to exemption from co-payment under ALD 14?
question.option_b: Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) with PaO2 < 60mmHg and Long-term Disability
